br.octahedron.cotopaxi.cloudservice.common
Class Task

java.lang.Object
  br.octahedron.cotopaxi.cloudservice.common.Task

public abstract class Task
extends Object

Creates a task to be executed after a given delay time. The task will be scheduled using the TaskManager. To create a Task, this class should be extended, overriding the Task#run method.

Author:
Danilo Penna Queiroz - daniloqueiroz@octahedron.com.br

Constructor Detail

Task

public Task(Map<String,String> params)
Creates a new Task, to be executed, using the given params/properties. Params are a pair of Strings, (key,value), that will be available when executing the task.

Parameters:
params - A String x String Map contain the params for task execution.

Parameters:
params - A String x String Map contain the params for task execution.
